critical.description: Number of critical patches available for installation.

updates.description: Number of updates category patches available for installation.

other.description: Number of other patches available for installation.

maximumDuration.description: Specifies the maximum amount of time that the operation will run. It must be an ISO 8601-compliant duration string such as PT4H (4 hours)

windowsParameters.description: Input for InstallPatches on a Windows VM, as directly received by the API

linuxParameters.description: Input for InstallPatches on a Linux VM, as directly received by the API

MachineInstallPatchesParameters.description: Input for InstallPatches as directly received by the API

classificationsToInclude.description: The update classifications to select when installing patches for Windows.

kbNumbersToInclude.description: Kbs to include in the patch operation

kbNumbersToExclude.description: Kbs to exclude in the patch operation

excludeKbsRequiringReboot.description: Filters out Kbs that don't have an InstallationRebootBehavior of 'NeverReboots' when this is set to true.

maxPatchPublishDate.description: This is used to install patches that were published on or before this given max published date.

WindowsParameters.description: Input for InstallPatches on a Windows VM, as directly received by the API

classificationsToInclude.description: The update classifications to select when installing patches for Linux.

packageNameMasksToInclude.description: packages to include in the patch operation. Format: packageName_packageVersion

packageNameMasksToExclude.description: packages to exclude in the patch operation. Format: packageName_packageVersion

LinuxParameters.description: Input for InstallPatches on a Linux VM, as directly received by the API

status.description: The overall success or failure status of the operation. It remains "InProgress" until the operation completes. At that point it will become "Failed", "Succeeded", "Unknown" or "CompletedWithWarnings."

installationActivityId.description: The activity ID of the operation that produced this result.

rebootStatus.description: The reboot state of the VM following completion of the operation.

maintenanceWindowExceeded.description: Whether the operation ran out of time before it completed all its intended actions.

excludedPatchCount.description: The number of patches that were not installed due to the user blocking their installation.

notSelectedPatchCount.description: The number of patches that were detected as available for install, but did not meet the operation's criteria.

pendingPatchCount.description: The number of patches that were identified as meeting the installation criteria, but were not able to be installed. Typically this happens when maintenanceWindowExceeded == true.

installedPatchCount.description: The number of patches successfully installed.

failedPatchCount.description: The number of patches that could not be installed due to some issue. See errors for details.

startDateTime.description: The UTC timestamp when the operation began.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The UTC timestamp when the operation finished.

startedBy.description: Indicates if operation was triggered by user or by platform.

patchServiceUsed.description: Specifies the patch service used for the operation.

osType.description: The operating system type of the machine.

errorDetails.description: The errors that were encountered during execution of the operation. The details array contains the list of them.

MachineInstallPatchesResult.description: The result summary of an installation operation.

source.description: The source of the run command script.

parameters.description: The parameters used by the script.

protectedParameters.description: The parameters used by the script.

asyncExecution.description: Optional. If set to true, provisioning will complete as soon as script starts and will not wait for script to complete.

runAsUser.description: Specifies the user account on the machine when executing the run command.

runAsPassword.description: Specifies the user account password on the machine when executing the run command.

timeoutInSeconds.description: The timeout in seconds to execute the run command.

outputBlobUri.description: Specifies the Azure storage blob where script output stream will be uploaded. Use a SAS URI with read, append, create, write access OR use managed identity to provide the VM access to the blob. Refer outputBlobManagedIdentity parameter.

errorBlobUri.description: Specifies the Azure storage blob where script error stream will be uploaded. Use a SAS URI with read, append, create, write access OR use managed identity to provide the VM access to the blob. Refer errorBlobManagedIdentity parameter.

outputBlobManagedIdentity.description: User-assigned managed identity that has access to outputBlobUri storage blob. Use an empty object in case of system-assigned identity. Make sure managed identity has been given access to blob's container with 'Storage Blob Data Contributor' role assignment. In case of user-assigned identity, make sure you add it under VM's identity. For more info on managed identity and Run Command, refer https://aka.ms/ManagedIdentity and https://aka.ms/RunCommandManaged

errorBlobManagedIdentity.description: User-assigned managed identity that has access to errorBlobUri storage blob. Use an empty object in case of system-assigned identity. Make sure managed identity has been given access to blob's container with 'Storage Blob Data Contributor' role assignment. In case of user-assigned identity, make sure you add it under VM's identity. For more info on managed identity and Run Command, refer https://aka.ms/ManagedIdentity and https://aka.ms/RunCommandManaged

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

instanceView.description: The machine run command instance view.

MachineRunCommandProperties.description: Describes the properties of a run command.

script.description: Specifies the script content to be executed on the machine.

scriptUri.description: Specifies the script download location. It can be either SAS URI of an Azure storage blob with read access or public URI.

commandId.description: Specifies the commandId of predefined built-in script.

scriptUriManagedIdentity.description: User-assigned managed identity that has access to scriptUri in case of Azure storage blob. Use an empty object in case of system-assigned identity. Make sure the Azure storage blob exists, and managed identity has been given access to blob's container with 'Storage Blob Data Reader' role assignment. In case of user-assigned identity, make sure you add it under VM's identity. For more info on managed identity and Run Command, refer https://aka.ms/ManagedIdentity and https://aka.ms/RunCommandManaged.

MachineRunCommandScriptSource.description: Describes the script sources for run command. Use only one of script, scriptUri, commandId.

executionMessage.description: Communicate script configuration errors or execution messages.

exitCode.description: Exit code returned from script execution.

MachineRunCommandInstanceView.description: The instance view of a machine run command.

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of run commands. Call ListNext() with this to fetch the next page of run commands.

MachineRunCommandsListResult.description: Describes the Run Commands List Result.

RunCommandInputParameter.description: Describes the properties of a run command parameter.

clientId.description: Client Id (GUID value) of the user-assigned managed identity. ObjectId should not be used if this is provided.

objectId.description: Object Id (GUID value) of the user-assigned managed identity. ClientId should not be used if this is provided.

RunCommandManagedIdentity.description: Contains clientId or objectId (use only one, not both) of a user-assigned managed identity that has access to storage blob used in Run Command. Use an empty RunCommandManagedIdentity object in case of system-assigned identity. Make sure the Azure storage blob exists in case of scriptUri, and managed identity has been given access to blob's container with 'Storage Blob Data Reader' role assignment with scriptUri blob and 'Storage Blob Data Contributor' for Append blobs(outputBlobUri, errorBlobUri). In case of user assigned identity, make sure you add it under VM's identity. For more info on managed identity and Run Command, refer https://aka.ms/ManagedIdentity and https://aka.ms/RunCommandManaged.

displayStatus.description: The short localizable label for the status.

message.description: The detailed status message, including for alerts and error messages.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

gatewayId.description: A unique, immutable, identifier for the Gateway.

gatewayType.description: The type of the Gateway resource.

gatewayEndpoint.description: The endpoint fqdn for the Gateway.

allowedFeatures.description: Specifies the list of features that are enabled for this Gateway.

GatewayProperties.description: Describes the properties of a Gateway Profile.

GatewayType.description: The type of the Gateway resource.

allowedFeatures.description: Specifies the list of features that are enabled for this Gateway.

GatewayUpdateProperties.description: Describes the Update properties of a Gateway Profile.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of Gateways. Call ListNext() with this URI to fetch the next page of Gateways.

machineNameParameter.name: machineName
machineNameParameter.description: The name of the hybrid machine.

licenseProfileNameParameter.name: licenseProfileName
licenseProfileNameParameter.description: The name of the license profile.

runCommandNameParameter.name: runCommandName
runCommandNameParameter.description: The name of the run command.

baseProviderParameter.name: baseProvider
baseProviderParameter.description: The name of the base Resource Provider.

baseResourceTypeParameter.name: baseResourceType
baseResourceTypeParameter.description: The name of the base Resource Type.

baseResourceNameParameter.name: baseResourceName
baseResourceNameParameter.description: The name of the base resource.

settingsResourceNameParameter.name: settingsResourceName
settingsResourceNameParameter.description: The name of the settings resource.
